1.title: Citizen Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: We've got kids who push their parents over the limit, kids who try new foods, and kids who bond with their siblings. We mean, beat. Kids who beat their siblings.

2.title: Gone with the Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: We've got kids with unique talents, kids who know how to give attitude, and a kid with a sophisticated pallet for stinky cheese. We've also got kids who stay up past their bedtime just to give Mom and Dad a run for their money.

3.title: Night of the Living Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: We've got kids who know how to push Grandpa's buttons, kids who give their honest reactions to gifts, and kids who show us that we didn't need to spend money on a toy when a box will work just as well.

4.title: Third Graders of the Lost Ark

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: We've got kids stealing the show at weddings, kids who know how to celebrate the holidays, and kids who could still use some help figuring out the most important thing in life...the bathroom.

5.title: One Flew Over the Kid's Nest

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: We've got kids taking on their pets for master of the house, parents who shouldn't give up their day jobs to tell jokes, and kids who show their parents they're not to be messed with.

6.title: Lord of the Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: We've got kids who exercise, kids who discover the meaning of the universe, and kids who are still trying to figure out the meaning of the bathroom.

7.title: Kids Without a Cause

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: We've got kids who learn to love their pets, kids who learn to find themselves in the mirror, and kids who you love so much you need them to go away.

8.title: Kid on a Hot Tin Roof

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: We've got kids who are so brilliant they actually read the fine print, so frightening they will keep you up late, and so courageous one day they'll conquer a swing.

9.title: The Wild Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: We've got kids who get so close to nature, nature fights back. We've also got kids who learn the meaning of sharing as long as they don't actually have to.

10.title: Toddler Story

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: We've got kids who know exactly who they are, kids who play dress-up, still trying to figure it out, and parents who are no help at all.

11.title: The Fast, Young and the Furious

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: We've got pets who teach kids, kids who teach parents, and parents who have to put up with it all.

12.title: The Fantastic Four Year Old

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: We've got kids figuring out love, kids figuring out horses, and kids figuring out gravity. In the end, we solve nothing.

13.title: 2001 Kid Odyssey

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: We've got kids who face their fears by running from them, kids who want to share their lunch after they've eaten it - and also a girl who lets spiders crawl on her.

14.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: We've got kids who take up boxing inside actual boxes, kids who get musical with their arm pits. And also, a kid gets his finger stuck inside his nose. Like way in.

15.title: The League of Extraordinary Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: We've got kids who fly planes, kids who hate their birthdays, and we find out the store you need to go to if you want to purchase a kid for yourself.

16.title: There Will Be Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

16.plot: We've got kids who challenge authority - of their dogs, kids who get a lesson in gravity from a tire swing, and a kid who plays with a terrifying Jack-in-the-box.

17.title: Wild Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: We've got kids who shave their eyebrows and shock their friends, kids who hula-hoop and jump rope at the same time, and twins who compete in the first ever sleep-eating contest.

18.title: Dude, Where's My Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: We've got kids who show us what sounds animals and daddies make, dads who keep interrupting their daughter's phone calls, and a kid who invented leaf blower roller blades.

19.title: I am Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

19.plot: We've got kids terrified of Santas and beards, dads who do impressions of temper tantrums, and an epic game of tic-tac-toe between a boy and his monkey.

20.title: 28 Kids Later

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

20.plot: We've got kids terrorized by puppets, kids who bob for cake and kids who remove their loose teeth using string and running squirrels.

21.title: The Kid Next Door

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

21.plot: We've got kids trapped under live pigs, a father and son water skiing team, and kids unwittingly doing the ice bucket challenge.

22.title: 30 Days of Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

22.plot: We've got kids who go fishing but hate fish, kids who compose songs about peeing the bed and kids who can't stop laughing in their sleep.

23.title: Kung Fu Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

23.plot: We've got kids who scale kitchen appliances, kids who get a terrifying visit from the daddy monster and kids who have tea parties with monkeys.

24.title: Battlefield Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

24.plot: We got kids who argue with Siri, kids who stop soccer balls with their face and kids who ride Birthday ponies meant for the rodeo.

25.title: Kids of New York

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

25.plot: We've got kids who give their siblings a rude awakening, kids who wipe out on the ballet floor and kids who unwittingly swear like sailors.

26.title: O Kid Where Art Thou

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

26.plot: We've got kids who use their siblings as mops, kids who wake old people, and kids who try to eat pudding through their eyeballs.

27.title: The Hills Have Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

27.plot: We've got kids using power tools, a kid telling a story so good it puts the dogs to sleep, and a kid singing a heavy metal version of the ABC's.

28.title: Just Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

28.plot: We've got a Lego how-to expert, a kid who invents a pacifier slingshot, and a class photo that'll knock you over--or at least it'll knock some kids over.

29.title: Freaky Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

29.plot: We've got the Dark Knight in the daytime, a micro drone vitamin delivery system, and brothers who take a roller coaster way up, while trying to keep lunch down.

30.title: 50 First Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

30.plot: We've got a future professional golfer, parents playing tricks with Easter candy, and a kid who plays tag...with a leopard.

31.title: The Da Vinci Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

31.plot: We've got a kid who shows us how not to play with fire. A kid who demonstrates the dangers of yoga balls, and a girl who proves balloons can't really break your fall.

32.title: Meet the Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

32.plot: We've got superhero makeup tips, a kid who keeps getting interrupted by his monkey, and a kid who shows us how to land a BMX trick using only his face.

33.title: The Time Traveler's Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

33.plot: We've got a kid who tells us how he was bitten by a shark, a girl who shoots a bow and arrow with her feet, and a dad who turns snack time into a race for your life.

34.title: Walk the Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

34.plot: We've got a kid who gets an aerial tooth extraction, the next soccer superhero, and we learn how the color yellow, can start a fight.

35.title: House of Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

35.plot: We've got kids who help their dad make the biggest hard boiled egg in the world., a teenage stunt driver, and a kid who learns that ice is a solid -the hard way.

36.title: What Kids Want

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

36.plot: We learn how to write a song from a lyrical genius, a toddler who sits her parents down to discuss their behavior and a holiday elf who causes mischief for a little girl.

37.title: The Emperor's New Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

37.plot: We've got kids doing indoor dog sledding, an archer who's so good she'll pull your tooth out, and a two-year-old who can't wait for her newborn sister - to move out.

38.title: We Were Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

38.plot: We've got a class prank gone wrong, a fearless spider loving toddler, and a junior martial artist who chops through a flaming cucumber - sort of.

39.title: Batkid vs. Superkid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

39.plot: We've got kids who give Grandpa a shocking lesson in auto repair, kids who are really fun to scare, and kids with tips on how to train your llama.

40.title: One from the Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

40.plot: We've got a kid who tells us where babies come from, a dog who joins a kids' conga line, and a girl who shows us how to run with a bag on her head.

41.title: Kid of Green Gables

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

41.plot: We've got kids getting married, kids working on a homemade space program and kids decorating for Christmas - with a cannon.

42.title: Kiss of the Spider Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

42.plot: We've got a crazy trip to an amusement park, tips on turning off a light with a soccer ball, plus we show you how to make elephant toothpaste.

43.title: The Kids of Eastwick

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

43.plot: We've got a sister comedy roast, a two-year-old basketball prodigy, and kids who literally battle to stay up past bed time.

44.title: Ordinary Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

44.plot: We've got a chemistry experiment gone wrong, a workout with dad, and a toddler preacher who'll get you on your feet and make you say "Amen."

45.title: This Is Spinal Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

45.plot: We've got a kid who plays basketball with a Frisbee, a kid who parallel parks a car in the kitchen, and a toddler fleeing in horror from her mother in ghoul makeup.

46.title: A Kid Called Wanda

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

46.plot: We've got a class on how to cook your brother, a three-year-old who does one-armed push ups, and a kid who finds out baby belugas aren't all that nice.

47.title: Kids of Endearment

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

47.plot: We've got a dad lifting his kid with a toothbrush, a dad catching rugby balls with his face, and a kid who thinks he can open automatic doors with his mind.

48.title: For All Kidkind

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

48.plot: We've got a kid scolding her dad for a toilet seat infraction, toddlers laughing it up over their mom's driving, and kids watching their grandma ride a zip line.

49.title: License to Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

49.plot: We've got a kid horrified by her mom's singing, a toddler who teaches her dog to poop outside, and a new dad who can't get near a dirty diaper without gagging.

50.title: Raging Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

50.plot: We've got a kid who thinks tea cups are sensible shoes, a kid who uses dad's bald head as a dart board, and a kid who thinks his brother is a duck.

51.title: An American Kid in Paris

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

51.plot: We've got a kid with a drone in her hair, a kid who makes up psychedelic songs, and a kid with a real shot at getting a date with a supermodel. Maybe. Probably not.

52.title: Empire of the Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

52.plot: We've got a kid who freaks out during the a "got your nose" game, a kid chased by killer birds, and a kid who finds himself on the wrong end of a dirty diaper.

53.title: Field of Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

53.plot: We've got kids who make the world's worst how-to video, a baby whose playmate is a real Komodo dragon, and a kid who gets taken for a ride by a self-driving car.

54.title: Analyze Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

54.plot: We've got a kid who can potty-train while playing the guitar, a five-year-old in a slam-dunk contest, and a dad whose beard "disappears" and freaks out his toddler.

55.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

55.plot: We've got a boxing toddler, a dad who challenges his daughter to a gymnastics competition, and a kid who decorates the perfect Christmas tree...with his feet.

56.title: Kid Fiction

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

56.plot: We've got a debate between two toddlers about who passed gas in the car, a dad who builds a soda squirting machine, and highlights from the worst vacation ever.

57.title: Kids Labyrinth

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

57.plot: We've got a kid who can Pogo stick and jump rope at the same time, a snake-loving toddler, and a kid who's convinced he can slice a watermelon...with his head.

58.title: The Boondock Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

58.plot: We've got a baby who cries every time she hears opera, a kid who can summon wild deer, and a boy who has a special bond with his chicken.

59.title: Stranger Than Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

59.plot: We've got a kid who pulls a loose tooth using the family car, a girl who tests a dog shock collar on her dad, and an entire rink of young ice skaters who can't stand up.

60.title: The Last Kid of Scotland

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

60.plot: We've got kids that play with a wild squirrel, a dad babysits in a unicorn suit, and a boy who turns his hotel room into a night club...whether mom likes it or not.

61.title: Beverly Hills Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

61.plot: We've got a future boxer eating raw eggs, tee ball tips to help you play the game wrong, and a super secret sister hand shake. - that we're sharing with everyone.

62.title: A Kids Tale

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

62.plot: We've got a collection of crazy kid dancers, parents getting launched from playground equipment, and kids on go-karts who learn a little about road rage.

63.title: City of Kids

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

63.plot: We've got an intense competition, the world's youngest food critic, and a magic show where the best trick is making the audience disappear.

64.title: Requiem for a Kid

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

64.plot: We've got a toddler who starts a dancing flash mob, a kid who gets help with his homework from a duck, and a dad who can slice an apple...with his bare hands.

65.title: Where the Wild Kids Are

episode of.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things (TV Series 2016– )

65.plot: We've got a kid who gets up close with an octopus, a kid with a contagious case of the giggles, and a kid who destroys his dad's drum set with one accidental move.

imdb.title: Kids Do the Craziest Things
akas: Kids Do the Craziest Things (United States)
plot: _Kids Do the Craziest Things_ (qv) brings you the most hilarious, ridiculous, and timeless moments of kids growing up all around the world. Whether they're cute, curious or just a little bit crazy, we capture every mischievous moment.
